pages.text: $(l)Influential Blocks$() $(br)$(li)Prismarine$(li)Lapis Block$(li)Lapis Ore$(li)Calcite$(li)Dripstone Block$(li)Gold Ore$(li)Sand$(li)Sponge Block

The following array of numbers lists the amount of potential block values required for this gem to emerge. Please note that this is a rough estimate and your results will vary.$(br)[315, 25, 95, 10, 0, 70]
This gem can be injected with tier 1 and tier 2 injector setups.
